title.narrative: OUTPUT 28: SP PROGRAMME STRENGTHENING

description.narrative: Key social protection programmes have strengthened operational capacity and are supported to improve coverage, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, more children from vulnerable families benefit from a social protection system

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF GENDER CHILDREN AND SOC PROTECTION

mailing-address.narrative: 4-8 Rangoon Close Ward 24 P.O. Box 5051 Cantoments Accra

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Key social protection programmes have strengthened operational capacity and are supported to improve coverage

description.narrative: UNICEF provides technical support to LEAP, the Ghana School Feeding Programme, and NHIS to improve the quality of services and efficiency. A key activity, particularly in the first half of 2021 was supporting MoGSCP to deliver and monitor COVID-19 relief payments. UNICEF provided strategic support to LEAP and GSFP in the finalization of their operational manuals as well as adapting their operations in the COVID context. An initial strategy for reassessment of LEAP eligibility has been developed and the plan for a pilot phase has been approved. NHIS enrolment of LEAP participants have expanded significantly through the ISS initiative. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:02/02/2022

title.narrative: 2.10 Cash transfers: Cash transfer system is being effectively IMPLEMENTED including the expanding coverage and improving inclususion of children (e.g. beneficiary identification, grievance mechanisms, cash delivery mechanisms).

actual.value: 2021:scale up plans being finalized for national roll out
